original_title: Stranger Than Fiction: The Nanny Killers
overview: The murder of French au-pair Sophie Lionnet by her employers made headlines all over the world. From the horrible circumstances of her death, to the obsession of her killer with a pop-star ex-boyfriend and their crazy delusions of celebrity paedophile rings, it was a case that seemed too unbelievable to be true.
title: Stranger Than Fiction: The Nanny Killers
